message.text: Welcome to #name – Hunt, build, survive and trade your loot at the Traders!
#name – Traders • Zombies • Hunting • Weekend Raids • Cars. Enjoy your stay, survivor.
RULES: No cheating/duping, no toxic behavior. Respect other survivors and staff. Raiding only in allowed raid times.
SAFEZONES: No PVP, no stealing, no ramming vehicles. Traders are for trading, not killing.
Looking for help, server rules? Join our Discord community! Press B to open the Party Menu. Find the Discord button in the Server Information panel.
RAIDS: Raiding is ONLY allowed during weekend raid hours. Check Discord for exact times and rules.
BaseBuildingPlus: Find a BBP Workbench Kit & BBP Crafting Book. Add 99 nails + planks to start crafting your base parts.
BBP Cement Mixer: Place the mixer, add a car/truck battery and 2 bags of cement, then turn it on to produce concrete bricks.
Cars: Park on flat ground, avoid heavy builds around vehicles and dont log out while driving – help keep the server stable.
Fair play: No combat logging, ghosting or abuse of glitches. Play smart but play fair – admins may review logs.
Thank you for playing on #name. Consider leaving a favorite and sharing the server with your friends.
